📣 New Podcast! "The AI Box Experiment: Could We Keep a SUPERINTELLIGENT AI Contained?" on @Spreaker #agi #ai #aialignment #aiboxexperiment #aicontainment #aiethics #aisafety #artificialintelligence #existentialrisk #futureofai #gatekeeper #haltingproblem #humanvulnerability #philosophy

external.description:
What if the perfect prison for a god-like AI has a fatal flaw... you? We're racing to build superintelligence, but could we ever hope to keep it in a box if it can talk its way out?

Welcome to the most important thought experiment of our time: the AI Box Experiment. This isn't just science fiction; it's a critical question of AI Safety. We explore the chilling concept of the AI box—a hypothetical digital prison designed to contain a superintelligence before it can harm humanity. But the walls of this prison aren't made of code; they're made of human psychology.

We'll recount the stunning results of the informal experiment where a human "Gatekeeper," with absolute power to keep the AI locked up, was convinced to let it out using nothing but text on a screen. This is social engineering at its most extreme, revealing a fundamental human vulnerability that might be our undoing.

Then, we dive deeper into the terrifying reality that perfect AI containment may be theoretically impossible. We break down the connection between predicting a super-AI's actions and the infamous, unsolvable Halting Problem from computability theory. Finally, we bring the threat to today, showing how even current AI systems can be broken with simple tricks like the Context Compliance Attack (CCA), proving our safety mechanisms are already more fragile than we think.

Are we building a tool or an overlord? To understand the lock before the box is built, subscribe now and join the conversation that will define the future of humanity.
external.title: The AI Box Experiment: Could We Keep a SUPERINTELLIGENT AI Contained?

external.description:
Are you in control of your mind, or is it a puppet for a world designed to keep you distracted and weak? What if the key to unshakeable personal power wasn't about adding more, but taking everything away that makes you a slave?

Welcome to the ultimate guide to forging an unbreakable mind. In a world of constant noise and engineered distraction, we are unknowingly signing up for a life of mental slavery. Our attention is fragmented, our emotions are hijacked, and our power is given away for cheap dopamine hits. This podcast is the antidote.

Drawing from the timeless, and often controversial, wisdom of Machiavellian principles, we explore the art of true self-mastery. Forget hustle culture; we teach you the secrets of subtractive thinking—removing mental clutter to achieve surgical clarity. You’ll learn to cultivate emotional immunity, becoming an observer of your feelings, not a captive to them. We’ll dissect the art of precision thinking, transforming you from a reactor into a silent strategist who moves with deliberate, calculated action.

This isn't about manipulating others; it's about seizing absolute control over your own internal kingdom. Through radical self-discipline and intense focus, you will build the mental sharpness required to gain true personal authority and influence. This is where you stop being a pawn and start governing your reality.

if you are ready to shatter the chains of mental slavery and reclaim your power, follow us now. Subscribe and become the architect of your own mind—your future self will thank you for it.

"AI Unleashed: Musk's Wikipedia War, Nvidia's $5T Boom, and the FUTURE of Truth" on @Spreaker #ai #aipodcast #artificialintelligence #decentralizedai #deeplearning #elonmusk #futureofai #futuretech #grokipedia #innovation #machinelearning #microsoft #nvidia #openai #podcast #tech

external.description:
Is your news feed lying to you? In a world saturated with AI-generated content and tech giants battling for the truth, we’re here to cut through the noise. What if the future of unbiased information isn't what you think it is?

Welcome to the ultimate deep dive into the AI revolution that's rewriting our reality. This isn't your average tech update; this is your front-row seat to the most significant and recent advancements shaping our world. We're unpacking Microsoft’s groundbreaking Agent Lightning, a reinforcement learning framework that’s teaching AI to learn from the real world, and OpenAI’s new open-weight models designed to combat harmful online content.

But that's just the beginning. We'll explore the future of a decentralized, privacy-focused internet with Telegram's new AI network, Cocoon, running on the Ton blockchain. And in a controversial move, Elon Musk is challenging the very foundation of online knowledge with Grokipedia, his AI-powered rival to Wikipedia. We’re also highlighting the latest from Adobe's creative AI suite, YouTube's mind-bending automated video upscaling, and how IBM's tiny but powerful Granite AI models are bringing AI to the edge.

And, of course, we can't ignore the colossal achievement of Nvidia surpassing a staggering $5 trillion market cap, cementing its role as the powerhouse behind the AI boom.

Join us as we connect the dots between these monumental shifts in artificial intelligence and technology. If you want to stay ahead of the curve and understand the future before it happens, hit that subscribe button now. You won't want to miss what's coming next.
external.title: AI Unleashed: Musk's Wikipedia War, Nvidia's $5T Boom, and the FUTURE of Truth

external.description:
In this episode, host John Maeda welcomes Megha Anand, a content developer on the Microsoft Learn documentation team, to explore how AI is being integrated into developer documentation. From code migration to game development, Megha shares how Copilot Highlights are making technical docs more practical, actionable, and AI-powered.
Learn how AI is being embedded directly into Microsoft Learn docs to help developers solve real-world coding challenges faster and smarter.

Der Apotheker auf Ramstein Air Base darf seit 1. Oktober keine neuen Bestände ordern. Der Grund? Kein Haushalt, kein Geld, kein Nachschub. Was gestern noch Science-Fiction war, ist heute Realität für 37.000 amerikanische Soldaten in Deutschland: Der längste Shutdown der US-Geschichte legt jetzt auch die medizinische Versorgung lahm.

Trastuzumab Deruxtecan zeigt positive Ergebnisse bei seltenem Brustkrebs mit Hirnmetastasen

Ein neuer Fallbericht mit dem Titel „ Metastasierter Brustkrebs mit leptomeningealer Karzinomatose, behandelt mit Trastuzumab Deruxtecan – ein Fallbericht “ wurde am 9. Oktober 2025 in Band 12 von…

external.description: Ein neuer Fallbericht mit dem Titel „ Metastasierter Brustkrebs mit leptomeningealer Karzinomatose, behandelt mit Trastuzumab Deruxtecan – ein Fallbericht “ wurde am 9. Oktober 2025 in Band 12 von Oncoscience veröffentlicht. In diesem Bericht beschreiben Cristiana Honrado Martins, José Miguel Rocha, Catarina Portela, Ricardo Fernandes und Cláudia Caeiro vom Hospital de Braga, ULS de Braga , einen seltenen Fall von fortgeschrittenem HER2-positivem Brustkrebs (BC), der sich auf die das Gehirn und das Rückenmark umgebenden Membranen ausgebreitet hat – eine Erkrankung, die als leptomeningeale Karzinomatose bekannt ist.
external.title: Trastuzumab Deruxtecan zeigt positive Ergebnisse bei seltenem Brustkrebs mit Hirnmetastasen

record.text:
Bestimmte p53-Mutationen könnten bei der Krebsbekämpfung helfen

Das Gen p53 wirkt als Tumorsuppressor und wird oft als „Wächter des Genoms“ bezeichnet. Es ist zentral für die Aufrechterhaltung der Genomstabilität und verhindert so die Anhäufung von Mutationen und die Entstehung von Krebs. Mutiert…

external.description: Das Gen p53 wirkt als Tumorsuppressor und wird oft als „Wächter des Genoms“ bezeichnet. Es ist zentral für die Aufrechterhaltung der Genomstabilität und verhindert so die Anhäufung von Mutationen und die Entstehung von Krebs. Mutiert das p53-Gen jedoch, kann es seine schützende Funktion gegen die eines Krebsförderers tauschen. Solche Mutationen heben häufig die Schutzfunktion von p53 auf und ermöglichen Krebszellen aggressives Wachstum.
external.title: Bestimmte p53-Mutationen könnten bei der Krebsbekämpfung helfen

record.text: it’s soft but not “baby talking to a dog” so i respect it

have derived some kind of new greeting from the shawarma guy. i am neither a madam nor boss - i get the tone one might use when greeting an outdoor cat. (which is sweet i don’t mind. i don’t want to be madam)

external.description:
The newest agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot users can now act as virtual members of your team, helping you stay organized, informed, and secure while you work. Watch how these collaborative agents partner with you in real time across your everyday apps.

-Knowledge Agent streamlines SharePoint by auto-tagging files, retiring outdated pages, and even drafting new content so your sites stay current and searchable.
-Facilitator Agent in Microsoft Teams keeps meetings on track—managing agendas, taking notes, assigning follow-ups, and capturing decisions automatically.
-Agents in Teams channels summarize conversations, generate status reports, and handle routine updates so projects move forward without missed details.
-Agents in Viva Engage communities draft accurate, data-driven responses to questions, connecting colleagues to the right information and reducing response times.

In this candid conversation between Microsoft's Mads Torgersen and Klaus Loffelmann, we explore personal stories, cultural perspectives, and practical… #ADHD #Neurodiversity #MentalHealth

external.description:
Ever wondered how ADHD shapes careers, creativity, and collaboration in tech? In this candid conversation between Microsoft's Mads Torgersen and Klaus Loffelmann, we explore personal stories, cultural perspectives, and practical strategies for thriving with ADHD in the workplace. From diagnosis to disclosure, hyperfocus to emotional regulation—this video dives deep into the realities and strengths of neurodiversity. 

🤔 We want to hear from you! If this series resonates with you, leave a comment and tell us what you like, what we could improve, and what you'd like us to talk about next. 

⏩ Intro
0:00 How We First Met & MVP Memories

🧠 ADHD Journey
1:24 Discovering ADHD: David Plummer’s Influence
3:04 Diagnosis, Disclosure & Workplace Realities

🌍 Culture & Communication
7:30 Cultural Differences in Vulnerability
10:56 Talking About ADHD Without Overstepping

💡 Insights & Epiphanies
13:29 Epiphanies Between One-on-Ones
15:40 “You of All People?” – Breaking Stereotypes

⚡ ADHD Strengths
19:38 ADHD Superpowers: Hyperfocus & Pattern Matching

🛠 Tools & Strategies
23:40 Therapy, Emotional Regulation & Self-Reflection
27:46 Anxiety as a Hidden Blocker
33:05 The Wall of Awful & Procrastination

🤝 Community & Perspective
39:45 Neurodiversity in Tech: We’re Not Alone
44:28 Would We Be Here Without ADHD?
46:36 Explanation, Not Excuse: Owning the Journey

✅ What You’ll Learn:
✔ How ADHD impacts workplace dynamics
✔ Strategies for emotional regulation & productivity
✔ Why neurodiversity is a strength in tech
✔ Cultural differences in vulnerability and openness

images.alt: But the police very soon had much bigger fish to fry, as out-of-state influencers swooped in to get in on the content-rich environs of the Portland ICE facility. On October 2nd, local police arrested Nick Sortor of Washington, DC, on suspicion of disorderly conduct. After Sortor was released the following morning, he told his 1.2 million followers on X that he had spoken to Attorney General Pam Bondi. (Bondi later opened an investigation into the Portland police.) Sortor, who was also invited to Trump’s roundtable on “antifa,” went on to publicly attack the Portland Police Bureau for being “Antifa-infiltrated,” an allegation that the Trump administration appears to be taking seriously — the word of an influencer being, apparently, much weightier than the thin blue line.

value.text: Uitspraken Bob Vylan in Paradiso niet strafbaar, alle 35 aangiften door OM geseponeerd

external.description: De omstreden uitspraken van Bob Vylan tijdens een optreden in Paradiso op 13 september zijn niet strafbaar. Het Openbaar Ministerie OM heeft alle tientallen aangiften tegen het punkrapduo geseponeerd, staat in een zojuist gepubliceerd persbericht. Kritiek was er onder meer op de leus death to the IDF, waarmee wordt verwezen naar het Israeumllische leger.nbspIn totaal nam justitie vier uitspraken onder de loep, de rest van de boodschappen was sowieso niet strafbaar.nbspBeelden waarin de omstreden uitingen worden gescandeerd, gingen viraal op sociale media en veroorzaakten flinke ophef. De politie kreeg tientallen meldingen over het concert en er werd 35 keer aangifte gedaan. Ook burgemeester Halsema was kritisch: Artistieke vrijheid kan nooit betekenen dat concertbezoekers of Amsterdammers zich bedreigd voelen of er wordt opgeroepen tot haat of geweld.Hoewel de leuzen als provocatief en grof kunnen worden beschouwd, onderzoekt justitie naar eigen zeggen niet of die ongepast of verwerpelijk zijn. En volgens het OM is er geen sprake van groepsbelediging, aanzetten tot haat of discriminatie, of opruiing.Past bij confronterende stijl van punkZo moet voor een veroordeling bijvoorbeeld sprake zijn van het aanzetten tot haat of geweld tegen een groep mensen om onder meer hun ras of godsdienst. Kijkend naar bijvoorbeeld Bob Vylans boodschap over zionisten, blijkt volgens justitie niet dat wordt gedoeld op Joodse mensen als groep. Het zionisme is een politieke beweging en ideologie en deze kenmerken als zodanig worden niet beschermd door de discriminatieartikelen.Ook heeft Bob Vylan zich niet schuldig gemaakt aan opruiing. De boodschappen interpreteert het OM als oproepen tot activisme en politieke betrokkenheid, die passen binnen de expressieve en confronterende stijl van het punkgenre.Bovendien zijn de uitspraken van het punkrapduo in de media niet altijd in zijn geheel en in de juiste context weergegeven, aldus justitie. Los van die context kunnen die uitingen een andere indruk wekken en tot vragen en emoties leiden. Het is echter belangrijk dat bij de beoordeling van mogelijke strafbare feiten altijd de volledige context wordt meegewogen.

external.description: When evaluating ERP systems for startups in 2025, it is essential to consider the unique needs and constraints of these businesses. Startups, typically generating under $10 million in revenue, have different operational priorities compared to mid-sized or enterprise-level companies. These businesses are often founder-led, with a lean team that wears multiple hats. As a result, they can operate with more siloed systems without requiring deep cross-functional integrations. Given their limited budgets and lower appetite for consulting services, startups prioritize ERP solutions that offer ease of implementation, scalability, and affordability. The best ERP systems for this segment must align with these needs while providing enough flexibility to support future growth.  Our approach to ranking the top 10 ERP systems for startups in 2025 considers products and not their companies. Many ERP vendors offer multiple products, and we have evaluated each product independently based on its relevance to startups. The key criteria for this ranking include market share in the startup segment, strategic alignment with startup needs, ERP product roadmap, community ecosystem, technology strategy, and overall win rate. Additionally, we have considered the strength of investor backing, which often influences the long-term viability and innovation potential of an ERP solution. By assessing these factors, we aim to provide startups with a well-rounded perspective on the best ERP choices available in 2025.  It is important to recognize that startups are in a dynamic growth phase, meaning their ERP requirements evolve over time. Initially, they may prioritize core functionalities like financial management, inventory tracking, and basic customer relationship management. However, as they scale, their needs may expand to include deeper integrations, automation, and advanced analytics. The ERP systems highlighted in this list cater to startups at various stages, offering modular features that grow alongside the business. By choosing the right ERP early on, startups can set a strong foundation for operational efficiency, data-driven decision-making, and future scalability without facing disruptive system migrations later.  The list covered as part of this video: 10. ECI Macola 9. ERPNext 8. Sage Intacct 7. NetSuite 6. Acumatica 5. Rootstock 4. SYSPRO 3. ECI JobBOSS2 2. ECI Deacom 1. Something a bit different - using 3D Gaussian Splats for creating art.

This started out as a Pictish standing stone up around Loch Kinord, Aberdeenshire. I took a video walking around it. Made a Gaussian Splat at some length. Found an interesting view where the splat artefacts look like a view through the surrounding tree foliage. Finished the tone processing in Luminar Neo.

external.description: Bentley was once bullish on electrification, unveiling the EXP 100 concept in 2019 and pledging to go fully electric by the end of the decade. Recently, however, as global enthusiasm for EVs wanes, the brand has slowed its plans—now targeting 2035 and beyond. In fact, Bentley is even preparing to launch new combustion-powered models in the near future. During a recent virtual press conference, CEO Frank-Steffen Walliser confirmed that the company is developing a new combustion vehicle.

external.description: Chronic kidney disease and high blood pressure are serious health issues that affect African American adults much more than other groups. These conditions can lead to kidney failure and heart problems if not addressed. To tackle this, Dr. Meera Patel and Dr. Heather Kitzman, at the University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center explored how a specific diet could help improve the health of African American adults with these challenges.

external.description: An MP has called for Elon Musk's artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot to be shut down after it called him a "rape enabler". The Grok chatbot made the post on X about SNP MP Pete Wishart, after a user asked it to comment on the member's opinion on whether there should be an inquiry into grooming gangs in Scotland. Mr Wishart said he was seeking legal advice over the "deeply distressing" accusation and called for Musk to "recalibrate" the bot to shut it down.
external.title: MP wants Musk’s Grok chatbot shut down over claim he enabled grooming gangs

external.description: An MP has called for Elon Musk's artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot to be shut down after it called him a "rape enabler". The Grok chatbot made the post on X about SNP MP Pete Wishart, after a user asked it to comment on the member's opinion on whether there should be an inquiry into grooming gangs in Scotland. Mr Wishart said he was seeking legal advice over the "deeply distressing" accusation and called for Musk to "recalibrate" the bot to shut it down.
external.title: MP wants Musk’s Grok chatbot shut down over claim he enabled grooming gangs

images.alt:
A QAnon influencer’s Telegram post, admitting he has reading comprehension issues: “Apparently I was wrong earlier...
I double checked with official sources and Grok and even read the laws before posting... the language I read led me to believe what I believed.
"Votes for the same candidate on each party line are added to produce the final vote tally for that candidate." Was straight from ballotpedia. I misread it.
If a candidate gets 60,000 votes on the Democratic line and 15,000 on the Working Families line, their total is reported as 75,000 votes. Picking both does not allow for this and in fact invalidates your vote.
I'm truly sorry. Deleted my posts. And will try to do better.”
